name: China Eastern 787-9 Business Class - How Good is China's Best?
description:
Try Dashlane here: https://www.dashlane.com/dennis
Get 2 months free on a 12 month subscription using promo code:  dennis

China Eastern has a reputation for being the best of the Chinese mainland carriers.  But how good are they?   Watch this video to find out.

Join me as I take my first ever flight with China Eastern on a 787-9 from Melbourne to Shanghai in business class. 

This review covers the entire journey from the Qantas first class lounge in Melbourne through to the entire onboard experience including boarding, take off, the China Eastern business class seats, service, entertainment system, amenities and menus.  

Enjoy!


Route:     Melbourne (MEL) to Shanghai (PVG)
Length:   4,988 miles,  9:52 hrs
Flight:     MU738  Seat 10A
Aircraft:  Boeing 787-9  registration B-1111 (Sept 2018)
When:    2 June 2019

Camera:  Panasonic HC-VX1


This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.
